title: Stacker News Meetup Guide
description: Complete guide for setting up Lightning wallets and joining Stacker News discussions for Builder meetups.

sections.title: Quick Start Guide
sections.body:
### Before the Event:

1. **Download a Lightning Wallet**
   - Wallet of Satoshi (easiest) OR Phoenix Wallet
   - Available on iOS and Android app stores

2. **Open the wallet** - No setup needed, just open the app

3. **Go to Stacker News and Sign Up**
   - Visit: https://stacker.news
   - Click "Sign Up" → "Sign Up with Lightning"
   - **Mobile**: Copy the invoice, paste in your wallet's "Send" section
   - **Desktop**: Scan the QR code with your wallet app

4. **Visit Our Meetup Post**
   - Go to: https://stacker.news/items/1416761
   - Introduce yourself and share what you're hoping to get from the event

5. **Need Sats to Post?**
   - Each post costs 6 sats minimum
   - Message me on Luma and I'll send you some!

sections.title: Step 1: Download a Lightning Wallet
sections.body:
You'll need a Lightning wallet to sign into Stacker News. We recommend one of these two options:

**Option A: Wallet of Satoshi (Recommended for Beginners)**

- **What it is**: The simplest Lightning wallet available
- **Where to get it**: Search "Wallet of Satoshi" in your phone's app store
- **Platforms**: iOS and Android
- **Why we like it**: No setup required, just download and start using

**Option B: Phoenix Wallet**

- **What it is**: A slightly more advanced but still user-friendly Lightning wallet
- **Where to get it**: Search "Phoenix Wallet" in your phone's app store
- **Platforms**: iOS and Android
- **Why we like it**: Good balance of simplicity and control

**Important Notes:**

- You do NOT need to fund your wallet to sign into Stacker News
- We're keeping this simple - no need to worry about seed phrases or backups for now
- This is just to get the tool in your hands and start practicing!

sections.title: Step 2: Sign Into Stacker News with Lightning
sections.body:
Once you have your wallet installed, it's time to create your Stacker News account.

### For Mobile Users:

1. **Open your browser** and go to https://stacker.news
2. **Tap "Sign Up"** in the top right corner
3. **Select "Sign Up with Lightning"**
4. You'll see a QR code and a long text string (the Lightning invoice)
5. **Tap the invoice text to copy it**
6. **Open your Lightning wallet app** (Wallet of Satoshi or Phoenix)
7. **Tap "Send"** in your wallet
8. **Paste the invoice** you copied
9. **Confirm the payment request** (this is just authentication, it costs nothing)
10. **Return to your browser** - within 60 seconds, you should be signed in!

### For Desktop Users:

1. **Open your browser** and go to https://stacker.news
2. **Click "Sign Up"** in the top right corner
3. **Select "Sign Up with Lightning"**
4. A QR code will appear on your screen
5. **Open your Lightning wallet app** on your phone (Wallet of Satoshi or Phoenix)
6. **Tap "Send"** or the camera/scan icon in your wallet
7. **Scan the QR code** on your computer screen
8. **Confirm the payment request** (this is just authentication, it costs nothing)
9. **Wait on the webpage** - within 60 seconds, you should be signed in!

**What Just Happened?**

You've just signed in using LNURL authentication! Your Lightning wallet acts like a secure login method - no passwords needed. Your Stacker News account is now tied to your Lightning wallet address.

sections.title: Step 3: Join Our Meetup Discussion
sections.body:
Now that you're signed in, let's get you to the meetup post!

1. **Go to our meetup thread**: https://stacker.news/items/1416761
2. You can bookmark this page to find it easily later
3. Read through any existing posts from other attendees

sections.title: Step 4: Introduce Yourself & Post
sections.body:
This is where you'll practice using Lightning for real!

### What to Post:

- Introduce yourself (first name, what brought you to the meetup)
- Share what you're hoping to get out of the event
- Feel free to ask questions!

### How to Post:

1. **Scroll to the bottom** of the thread
2. **Type your introduction** in the reply box
3. **Click "Post"**

### Important: Posting Costs 6 Sats

Each post on Stacker News requires a minimum of 6 sats. This helps prevent spam and creates a quality discussion space.

**Don't have any sats yet?** No problem!

- **Before the event**: Message me on Luma and I'll send you some sats to get started
- **At the event**: I'll be distributing sats to everyone who needs them
- Just let me know and I'll get you set up!

### How to Receive Sats:

When I send you sats, they'll appear in your Stacker News wallet balance. You can see your balance in the top right corner of the Stacker News website (it will show a ⚡ lightning bolt icon with a number).

sections.title: Step 5: Engage with Others
sections.body:
Once you've posted your introduction:

- Read other attendees' introductions
- Upvote posts you find interesting (this sends them sats!)
- Reply to others if you have thoughts or questions
- Check back periodically to see new responses

This is a great way to connect with fellow attendees before the meetup!

sections.title: What to Expect at the Meetup
sections.body:
**At the event:**

- We'll dive deeper into how Lightning and Stacker News work
- I'll be available to help with any technical issues
- We'll practice sending and receiving sats
- You'll see Lightning payments in action!

**After the event:**

- Continue the discussion on the same Stacker News thread
- Ask follow-up questions
- Share what you learned
- Stay connected with the community

sections.title: Troubleshooting
sections.body:
**"The sign-in is taking longer than 60 seconds"**

- Make sure you confirmed the payment request in your wallet
- Try refreshing the Stacker News page
- If still stuck, try signing in again from the beginning

**"I don't see a balance on Stacker News after you sent me sats"**

- Check your wallet app - the sats might be there instead
- To move sats from your wallet to Stacker News: Go to your Stacker News settings → Wallet → Attach your Lightning wallet

**"I'm in the US and can't download Wallet of Satoshi"**

- Use Phoenix Wallet instead - it works the same way!

**"I posted but it says I don't have enough sats"**

- Message me on Luma and I'll send you some sats right away
- At the event, find me in person and I'll get you set up

**Other Issues?**

- Reach out to me on Luma before the event
- At the event, I'll be available to help troubleshoot

sections.title: You're All Set!
sections.body:
Once you've completed these steps, you're ready for the meetup!

**Remember:**

- Your Stacker News account is tied to your Lightning wallet
- The same thread will be used for pre-event, event, and post-event discussion
- Bookmark the post: https://stacker.news/items/1416761
- Don't hesitate to reach out if you need sats or have questions

Looking forward to seeing you there! ⚡

*Questions? Reach out to me on Luma anytime.*
